Price: $16.99 - $14.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:06:21 UTC – Details)


Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude! The object of the game is to skillfully remove the sticks from the tube while dropping the fewest marbles possible. The translucent tube stands upright on a base that contains four separate numbered trays. Each player selects a numbered compartment to use throughout the game, and the straws are passed through holes midway of the tube to form a lattice “web.” The marbles are then placed in the top of the tube and held in place by the web. Just set it up, start playing and watch out for marbles that go “Ker Plunk!” The players must use steady hands and a cool head to remove the sticks from below the marbles. This best game from yester-year is just as much fun today! Share your great memories or start new ones! You and your friends will have a blast playing Ker Plunk!, just don’t let the marbles fall! For 2 to 4 players.
Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!
Create a “lattice” of sticks midway through the translucent tube and place the marbles on top; players choose one of four compartments in the base -2 to 4 people can play!
Players take turns removing sticks while trying to prevent the marbles from dropping through.
The player with the least number of marbles at the end of the game, wins!
A fsvorite game from yester-year that’s just as much fun today!

It’s a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!

Kerplunk! has been a family favorite for 50 years — and this beloved game is just as much fun today!

Read more

Easy to learn, so much fun to play!

There’s no reading required to play this cool kids’ game, so it’s great for kids and parents, alike!

Read more

Simple setup means more playtime!

Simple setup means more playtime!

Just create a web of sticks midway through the translucent tower, then pour the marbles overtop — it’s so easy!

Keep a steady hand and a cool head!

Players take turns pulling out one stick at a time — be careful not to let the marbles drop!

Don’t let the marbles go ‘Kerplunk’!

The player with the fewest marbles at the end of the game is the winner!

Read more

Fun competition and silly giggles!

This quick, easy game is the perfect party game for kids 5 years old & up — just don’t let the marbles drop!

Read more

Featuring striking scenes of morning and night skies, flowing streams, lush forests, and magnificent mountains, this pair of notebooks celebrates the immense beauty of the great outdoors. With tactile embossed covers, lined and unlined pages, and packaged with a twine tie, these eye-catching notebooks will inspire journalers, nature lovers, and travelers to document their adventures.

item.title: PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain – Large Waterer Great for Cats and Dogs – 2 Heights to Drink From – Great for Senior Pets – 100 Oz Water Capacity – Fresh, Filtered Water
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $41.99 - $29.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:10 UTC – Details)


Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. With this fountain, pets can drink from the flowing stream or from the bowl tiers (which is awesome) because your pet needs 1 ounce of water per 1 pound they weigh every day. The water constantly circulates which keeps things fresh and helps to promote good pet hygiene. The levels of this fountain make this great for pets of all sizes since they can drink water at a height that’s comfortable for them. This is especially great for senior pets, so they won’t have to bend down as much to drink from the upper tier. This fountain works hard to make sure your best friend will have fresh water. A carbon filter and fountain pump work together so your pet will always have clean water to drink. We’ve made this fountain easy to clean – simply place the fountain in the top rack of the dishwasher and hand wash the pump separately. Your pet deserves the best. Trust PetSafe to keep your pet healthy, safe and happy.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 11.94 x 5.94 inches; 2.35 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PWW00-13708
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 16, 2011
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Radio Systems Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0056ASTES
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Vietnam
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

GREAT FOR SENIOR PETS: The multi-tiered design of the fountain is great for senior or arthritic pets who can’t bend down to drink
ENCOURAGES HYDRATION: Falling water stream entices pets to drink more and helps support kidney health in pets through increased hydration
NO THIRSTY PETS: This fountain incorporates an open-bowl design so if your home loses power, your cat or dog will still have access to water
FRESH, FLOWING WATER: Replaceable carbon filter refreshes water and the foam filter catches pet hair and debris to keep your cat’s water clean
TOP-RACK DISHWASHER SAFE: Pet fountain is easy to keep clean, simply place it in the top rack of your dishwasher (excluding the fountain pump)
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions

Read more

Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

Let the fountain do the work!

Give your furry friend fresh, flowing water with the PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain. The falling water stream encourages your pet to drink more. The fountain features three places for your pets to drink from as well. Let us help keep your pet healthy and hydrated so you and your pet can live happy together.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Read more

Healthy Pet Lifestyle

No More Worry

The flowing stream and multiple drinking areas help encourage your pet to drink more, so they get the right amount of water each day to keep them healthy and hydrated.

No More Dirty Water

With the Multi-Tier pet fountain, your pet never has to drink dirty water again. The filters and constant water circulation helps keep the water fresh.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

Read more

Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet Replacement Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the carbon keeps water fresh, making it more appealing to drink. Replacement Premium Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the segmented carbon compartments offer even carbon distribution while keeping water fresh. Multi-Tier Pet Fountain Replacement Pump can be used as a replacement or as a back-up pump during pump cleanings. Comes with 3 brushes. Great for cleaning your Multi-Tier Pet Fountain pump. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet’s feeding schedule or give some snacks during the day through the smartphone app-enabled feeder.

3 Easy Steps to Clean the Pump

Take the Pump Apart

Remove & keep the blue face plate by using your finger to pull on the small tab on the side.

Remove the Stator

Remove & keep the blue teardrop shaped stator by pulling up on the small lip.

Remove the Impeller

Use a fingernail to pull out the impeller, which is held in place magnetically & keep it. Clean the pump parts with warm water and soap, then reassemble.

Product Description

It’s on! Game That Song!

Pick The Topic, Play The Songs, Choose The Winner!

Game That Song is the perfect card game for families, game night, parties, gifts, and people who just want to have a good time together. It even works as a game while social distancing and playing over video conference!

Easy to learn

Connects players by bringing back memories through music

Perfect for game night

If you love sharing music, you’ll love this game!

If you love music, you’ll LOVE Game That Song!

Have you ever spent time sharing music with your friends? This timeless tradition connects us like no other activity can.

But with Game That Song, the competition is on!

Who can pick the best song for the topic on the card? Who is best at figuring out the judge?

Game That Song is fun and easy to play, but challenging to win!

Endless Possibilities! Easy To Learn!

Get started right away!

If you know how to play music on your phone, you’ll understand how to play Game That Song after the first round.

The Ultimate Gift!

Your friends and family will never get bored of this game!

There’s always a new angle, a new strategy, a new song, and a new way to try and win! It’s easy to play, but challenging to win!

Get Game That Song! What’s do you get when you order?

1 beautiful black box, about 2x the depth of a deck of cards100 poker sized cards with different topics and 1 instruction cardUnlimited fun!

Party Games for Any Occasion

✘

Great Icebreaker

Designed for Fun

Appropriate for families

About the Startup Eric Robertson

College Professor

Describe your products in 3 words.

Fun, Connections, Music

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

I’ve coached little league for a long time and my wife and I would play walk-up songs for each kid as they stepped up to bat. It was always so fun to try and find the right song for every kid! We eventually started trying to come up with “the perfect song” for different situations. We made it into a card game for our friends and they loved it! We HAD TO make it into a game for the world to play!

What makes your product special?

It builds connections through music and competition. You get to hear songs that really take you back and then sometimes awesome tunes that you’ve never heard before.

What has been the best part of your experience?

Testing the product!

We’ve stayed up super late playing with so many people. Every time you play you have a blast and also get to know the players on a whole new level.

Perfect for game night to build connections with adults, family, teens and all music lovers!
Easy to learn, but challenging to win! Choose the card, play the songs, pick the winner!
Fun conversation starter to see how well you know the music taste of your family and friends
Take it with you or play over videoconference. As long as you have a way to listen to music and the deck, you can play!

It's on! Game That Song!

Pick The Topic, Play The Songs, Choose The Winner!

Game That Song is the perfect card game for families, game night, parties, gifts, and people who just want to have a good time together. It even works as a game while social distancing and playing over video conference!

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:42 UTC – Details)

From the brand

All in One Tools

Easy to Work

Gifts for Men

To My Best Love

How did we get started?

We started out as architects. Inspired by our day-to-day tool usage, we founded ForChic with a commitment to giving everyone the perfect tool they need.

What makes our products different?

Satisfying every customer is our ultimate pursuit. To get it, we need to optimize every detail at all costs.

Why do we love what we do?

We like to learn more about our competitors every day, learn from others’ strengths and improve them, and over time, our products will become more and more impeccable, and more and more customers will be satisfied.

High Precise Shape Duplication: Copy any shape or duplicate any object profile with ease. Great for tiling, wallpapering, circular frames, ducts fitting tiles, laminate, carpet, checking dimensions, moulding, etc. Useful tool for operations on car bodies, carpentry and for all kinds of modelling.
Adjustable Tightness and Locking Feature: Never worry about too loose or too tight of plastic pins to slide in. Using an bonus little Allen wrench You can simply adjust the tightness of plastic pins according to your preferences. Once the object has been contoured, lock contour gauge teeth in place for perfect identical traces every time.
Premium Material and Durable:The contour gauge is made of high quality ABS plastic, high strength, rustproof and durable, that will not easily break. And no harm for the surface of the target you would like to shape and duplicate. It is smooth to push and no lack of pins to influence precision.
Easy to Use: Guide the contour gauge’s teeth onto the object, lock the teeth in place, and trace. Copy it, Lock it, Trace it, Only 3 steps, you can easily copy and transfer the shape you want.
Customer Service: Quality and Customer Satisfaction are our top priorities. If you are not satisfied, no reason return policy to guarantee you the BEST purchase experience. And all ForChic products come with 24 hours friendly customer service.

With the ForChic Contour Gauge can easily copy any shape and is simple to use without any guessing, calculation and learning curve. Because it is simple and accurate, it can immediately reduce wasted materials and is good value for money. Very suitable for winding pipes, pipes, woodworking, most types of molding, etc.

Aluminum Lock Design

Metal locking mechanism keeps the shape stable to achieve high precision，designed for easy transfer and efficient work，Making your work more convenient.

Premium Plastic and High Precision

The contour gauge shape duplicator is made of high quality ABS plastic,high strength,rustproof and durable.Single needle down to 0.06″, providing a more accurate data.

Widened Design is More Practical

ForChic contour gauge profile tool is 50% wider than traditional profile gauge, the deepest could reach 2.5 inches, making it very suitable to contour deeper shapes meticulously.

This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the name of our company, it’s also our family name. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.
Wire Stripper and Crimper 2-Piece Tool Kit includes everything a tradesman needs for insulated terminal crimping, wire stripping and cutting
Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable self adjusts
Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Wiring Tool Kit with Automatic Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper, Great Electrical Tool Kit, 2-Piece

Product Description

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style. EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

★ THE COMPLETE WALL ORGANIZER FOR OFFICE: Everything you need for a mail organizer including the wall mount, all in one place. Super easy installation. Start using this wall file organizer right away to hold documents, files, notebooks and more all in one place for easy access. Perfect for the home office, the classroom or anywhere that you need a large wall organizer that’s durable and can hold serious weight without falling, bowing, bending or breaking.
★ THE ULTIMATE WALL HANGING FILE FOLDER ORGANIZER: No assembly needed. Just hang and use right away. This hanging mail organizer is attractive enough to use as a file holder wall mounted or as a standing file organizer if you wish. Comes in your choice of 3 colors, making it a great way to organize bills, tablets, notebooks, portfolios, photos, coloring books, magazines and so much more. Ideal as a hanging desk organizer too, with ample storage for your phone or digital devices underneath.
★ FITS IN TIGHT SPACES: Measures 12.5(l) x 4(w) x 16(h) inches but fits easily in tight or narrow spaces. Multi-use all paper holder for all your documents. The tray underneath also holds pens, notepads, staplers, bookmarks and more within easy reach, making it great for sorting mail, bills, photos, files, papers, magazines and more. Also great for storing cookbooks and recipes in the kitchen. The possibilities are virtually endless!
★ MULTI COLOR, MULTI PURPOSE: This hanging wall file organizer comes in three colors; professional black, white and grey. They are great for homeschooling or for use in the classroom as a vertical fil organizer Simple divider sections keep items in this vertical file organizer separated yet easy to reach when needed. Get rid of paper clutter and keep your space neat, tidy and organized with this all-in-one hanging wall organizer!
★ NEVER LOSE A BILL AGAIN: This sturdy wall file holder makes a great wall mail organizer and is durable enough to hold a considerable number of bills, papers, magazines and more. Organize incoming and outgoing mail, bills and other documents while keeping papers orderly. No more disorganized stacks of paper or an overflowing inbox. With NEATERIZE on your side, you’ve got it all accessible and under control.

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

  • ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected
  • DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.98 - $9.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:44:35 UTC – Details)


Comedy legends Dan Aykroyd and John Candy team up for the ultimate family vacation gone wrong in The Great Outdoors. When an uninvited and unwelcome family suddenly arrives to join their relatives for a summer of relaxation, the results are anything but restful. Chet Ripley’s (Candy) plans for a quiet vacation at a lakeside resort quickly take a turn when his obnoxious brother-in-law, Roman Craig (Aykroyd), and his snooty family appear unannounced and ready to join for a season of “fun” in the sun. Unfortunately, the only thing these two in-laws have in common is their intense dislike for each other. Soon, it’s brother-in-law against brother-in-law in an uproarious and hilarious fight to the finish!
Bonus Content:

  • Theatrical Trailer

TRAINING IS SO EASY-3 Simple Steps Training.Many of them have success on the very first day.With little to no training!Just read the reviews!Thousands of customers have had success training their dog to use Bells.Door Bells will help you make better commucations with pets come true!Simple and effective and are endorsed by pet professionals.
3 LEVEL ADJUSTABLE LENGTH-This upgraded design provides you 3 level of length adjustments compared to common two length bells.This allows for easy adjustment of the length to the bottom of the door or wall based on the size of your dog or the height of your door.Small dogs,medium dogs,big dogs and large dogs all love excell with our dog bells!
QUALITY BELLS&DURABILITY-Large,thick-walled jingle bells are made from durable metals.Tasteful design of silver coating of bells keep them shiny.And jingle sounds are easy on your ears from the playful dogs.Belt is custom made from heavy duty nylon material and tested thoroughly for its ruggedness.Our Bells are the loudest metal dog doorbells available on the market today and ring loud and clear every time!And lasts longer than other cheaply made alternatives.
FREE Gift-To appreciate your purchase, we are offering a dog whistle FREE along with this product. Hope you like it. But please remember, your fullest satisfaction is our top priority. If you are not happy with the purchase for any reason, do let us know. We refund or offer an exchange to ensure you become part of Papikin family.

This BLUETREE dog doorbell is the best Communication tool between you and your furry friend.House training, potty training for your doggy.With adjustable door bell length, small dogs, medium dogs, big dogs and large dogs all love with our dog bells.The tasteful design of silver coating of bells keep them shiny and jingle sounds are easy on your ears from the playful dogs.

Dog scratching doors! Help! Hate Barking, scratching broken the door? We offering an efficient way for your pet to let you know they need to go out.

-QUALITY Tired of cheap imitation bells?

-Tired of poor quality?

-Can not withst and the urge ang pull of your dog?

-As a doting pet owner,

-If you want to avoid carpet stains!

-This shoumelodious chime likes a signal from your puppyld be your last stop.

-“let me outside and I might go potty”

-It is a brilliantly simple solution to potty training.

DOG BELLS ARE THE PEFECT SOLUTION TO TOILET TRAIN YOUR LOVELY PET. HERE ARE 4 SIMPLE STMPLE AND EFFECTIVE STEPS TO TRAIN YOUR DOG TO USE DOORBELL.

STEPS 1. Introduce the bell to the dog. Let them feel it by sniffing it. let them hear the sound of the bell. Encourage its interest by giving her treats and show your appreciation that it knows you use only when she does good job (like good girl, my man.. good job etc.)

STEPS 2. Second stage is to get your dog to ring the bell. For this you can take the bell outside and show your how to ring the bell. You can use family environment she is comfortable with. Every time it rings the bell give her treat. Few dogs do better with lot of attention they get some get distracted. So please chose the set up based on your dog’s nature.

STEPS 3. Now place the bell where you intend to place it. Like hanging it to your backside door where you normally let the dog out. Ensure bell is firmly attached so that it doesn’t fall out by a simple tug/pull which might scare them. Again positively reinforce your appreciation with treat and words when they ring, do open the door and give her a treat when it goes out the door.

STEPS 4. It it is time make it a habit. If you used to let your dog go outside once you are up to let it potty/pee, use the same setup but this time make your dog ring the bell. Reward once it rings the bell and steps outside. Keep repeating this process until it becomes natural for the dog to ringing the bell is the natural way to ask to be let out.

Other tips：

Do this before your dog has breakfast so he is more food motivated.We strongly recommend patience and continuous positive reinforcement throughout. Dogs that love outdoors may take to the training faster. Consistency also plays a key role during initial days like, not letting your dog follow you outside without ringing the bell or giving treats when it doesn’t complete its part of the bargain.
